## Registered Systematic Reviews

I maintain a commitment to transparency of methods and reporting through prospective registration of systematic review protocols on [PROSPERO](https://www.crd.york.ac.uk/prospero/), the international database of systematic reviews. Below are my registered protocols, demonstrating expertise across a broad range of topics, including cardiovascular imaging, heart disease, and interventional cardiology.

## Methodological Expertise

All protocols follow international standards for systematic review conduct:

- **PRISMA** guidelines for reporting
- **GRADE** methodology for evidence assessment
- **Cochrane** risk of bias tools
- **Meta-analysis** using state-of-the-art statistical methods
